page.title: 17ST. STEPHENS SCHOOL
page.content: Apart from the playschool, the only educational establishment in the area is{St.Stephens First and Middle Church {of England School.}It has 224(max.360) pupils. Children start school the term following their fifth birthday, and if they are 12 by September 1st,they leave at the end of the summer term. Once they are 8 some children from neighbouring villages join in September. The school is church aided, the Rector of Godstone Church is Chairman of the Governors. All eight Governors are unpaid. The school provides full-time emloyment for 16 adults,the headmaster ,10 teachers,secretary,caretaker, and 3 kitchen staff. Working part-time are 2 teachers, 2 cleaners and 2 kitchen helpers. Cooks prepare 270 meals daily, 100 for the school and the remainder for schools in the district.
